description.value:
Githyanki culture venerates strength, martial prowess, and domination. Conditioned to fight and die for their Queen, they are trained from birth as warriors.

Martial Prodigy. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.GC7talgp20wh90A4]{Martial Prodigy} You are proficient with light and medium armor, and with shortswords and longswords.

Githyanki Psionics. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.ISVWd8FTNfIE3LDp]{Githyanki Psionics} If you are a gith, your innate psionics are strengthened with practice.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.OMDXBJQ5NCFPBX37]{Surge} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{Misty Step} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. When you cast them with this trait, they don't require components.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common, Gith, and one language of your choice.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
